meanings.definition: A person who teaches in a school.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated schoolteachers helped their students learn new things every day.
meanings.sent2: The schoolteachers at our school are very kind and patient with the children.
meanings.sent3: The schoolteachers decided to have a dance-off to make learning more fun.
meanings.sent4: The schoolteachers were like beacons of knowledge in the sea of young minds.
meanings.sent5: The schoolteachers' passion for education shone brightly in their classrooms.

meanings.sent1: Many schoolteachers gathered for a meeting to discuss educational strategies.
meanings.sent2: The schoolteachers in the district were excited for the upcoming school year.
meanings.sent3: The schoolteachers formed a band during their break time for some musical fun.
meanings.sent4: The schoolteachers stood together, a united front for the betterment of their students.
meanings.sent5: The schoolteachers' dedication to their profession was evident in their teamwork.
